head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZINSSER, BARBARA L. (MRS. HANS)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZINSSER, BARBARA L. (MRS. HANS)

block.p: ZINSSER-Barbara L. (Mrs. Hans). The American Farm School of Thessaloniki, Greece's Trustees, staff, students and friends honor the life of Mrs. Barbara L. Zinsser. A major force on the Board of the School, her wit, care, loyalty and keen insight guided us for more than 30 years. To quote the Greek: ''May your memory be eternal!''

ZINSSER-Barbara L. (Mrs. Hans). The American Farm School of Thessaloniki, Greece's Trustees, staff, students and friends honor the life of Mrs. Barbara L. Zinsser. A major force on the Board of the School, her wit, care, loyalty and keen insight guided us for more than 30 years. To quote the Greek: ''May your memory be eternal!''
